desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} {c_important}Nature Magic{/c} Skills have up to a {c_number}[{SF_0}|%|]{/c} chance to entangle the enemy with vines, Immobilizing them for {c_number}[{SF_1}]{/c} seconds and Poisoning them for {c_number}[{SF_2}*100|%|]{/c} of the Base damage dealt over {c_number}[SF_3]{/c} seconds.
